author: Nicole Sands
title: Riley Keough 'Loved' Michael Jackson
text:
Riley Keough has only fond memories of Michael Jackson and her visits to his famed Neverland Ranch.
â€œI loved him,â€ Elvis Presley â€˜s 27-year-old granddaughter says of the late musical legend in a new magazine with T , The New York Times Magazine . Her mother, Lisa Marie Presley , was married to the King of Pop for two years in the â€™90s.

A post shared by Riley Keough (@rileykeough) on Feb 15, 2017 at 12:12pm PST
The Girlfriend Experience star recalls splitting her time between Graceland and the 13-time Grammy winnerâ€™s $100 million Neverland Ranch in Los Olivos, which was equipped with a small amusement park, a petting zoo and a waterfall.
â€œThere were toys everywhere, animals everywhere, kids everywhere,â€ she says of the setting. â€œIt was like being at Disneyland all day.â€
Presley â€” who divorced her fourth husband Michael Lockwood in June of last year â€” and Jackson had an on-again, off-again relationship in the four years following their 1996 divorce.
â€œHe was an amazing person and I am lucky to have gotten as close to him as I did and to have had the many experiences and years that we had together,â€ she once wrote about Jackson, who died in 2009 . â€œI desperately hope that he can be relieved from his pain, pressure and turmoil now. He deserves to be free from all of that and I hope he is in a better place or will be.â€
